headline: Is Global Payments (GPN) Starting To Look Attractive After A Prolonged Share Price Slump
summary: Investors may be wondering whether Global Payments at around US$68.48 is starting to look like value, or if the market still has concerns reflected in the price. The share price is down 4.6% over the last week, 7.2% over the past month and 9.3% year to date, extending a 34.4% decline over 1 year and a 63.5% drop over 5 years. Recent attention on Global Payments has largely centered on how investors are reassessing payment companies and their role in broader financial services. Sentiment has...
